text.__SUMMARY__: Albizia burkartiana is a species of legume tree in the family Fabaceae.
text.Distribution:
The tree is endemic to southwestern Brazil.
It is only found in southwestern Paraná state and western Santa Catarina state, in the basin of the Iguazu River and Uruguay River.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Albizia burkartiana". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T36582A10003179. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T36582A10003179.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
